en.title: Syrian forces entered Lebanon amidst the Lebanese Civil War.
Spain held its first general election after Franco's dictatorship.
The US Senate officially designated November as National Alzheimer's Disease Awareness Month.
Azerbaijan adopted its new constitution via a national referendum.
Yuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center was honored with the Order of Friendship.
Lisa Leslie became the first player to dunk in a WNBA game.
Judas Priest guitarist Richie Faulkner replaced K.K. Downing.
Jair Bolsonaro was elected President of Brazil.
Elon Musk officially acquired Twitter for $44 billion.
